message.body: I just sent you three crazy emails. I have had too much coffee this morning. But I think the last two emails are really good. And you should read them. I am in faculty meetings most of the day. Will text after we are done.
Omg yes. Yes. Yes. By the way. Ur emails. Fuck yes. Billboard. Remixing. These are the things dreams are made of. Does Detroit do cheap billboards.
We need to have a week together to work.
What. Whoa. Wait. Ok. We have a lot to talk about. What are you doing this weekend
i am going to be in phlily but can still talk
Excellent. I'd call tonight but we are hosting a couple people for Shabbat. I'll text you tomorrow. More soon. Let's do this shit.
